work.name: SimplifyVMS
work.summary: Simplify VMS is secure private-cloud Vendor Management System. The solution is built on the most flexible technology stack, operating in the contingent workforce and service procurement market.
highlights: Design, Configuration and Implementation of User Profile Management Service.
Integrating with third-party services and internal service APIs as a part of implementation.
Developing new and customization of the existing features for the application.

Implementation of the set of new API endpoints related to the application, that provided critical connectivity channel for distributed functionality and increase system solidarity keeping manageable code complexity.

Performing system integration testing for the application modules using Jest that helped to improve system's stability and scalability by identification critical performance issues during development phase.
Managing and leading the team of software developers worked on the critical APIs. As a result major products updates have been completed on time.
Reviewing the quality of code for the application maintaining code and design consistency throughout.
Documenting solution architecture and API services for the internal team of developers reducing the TTCC (time-to-coordinate and code) by 60% ensuring high maintainability.
Implementation and configuration of the multi-tenant application for clients like Wipro, Evergy, Keybank etc.
Monitored, documented and prepared daily usage and status reports for clients and internal purposes.
